item.title: Sacrifice in the Service
item.description: As I look at you this evening, I can see many young men with their valiant fathers and loyal priesthood leaders seated side by side. These fathers and leaders are ready to pay the price, yes, even sacrifice, for the success of you young men.

item.title: Teachers, the Timeless Key
item.description: Regardless of life’s circumstances or the nature of one’s calling, all members of the Church have the opportunity to teach and to testify.

item.title: Future Leaders
item.description: I pray that you young people will develop a reverence for sacred things, a respect for your elders, and a willingness to keep the commandments. I pray that you will learn to know of the Savior.

item.title: The Worth of Souls
item.description: When we see the effect one person can have … , it perhaps is no wonder that the Lord reminded us, “Remember the worth of souls.”
